products.heading: Monstera
products.description: Monstera is a genus of 45 species of flowering plants in the arum family, Araceae, native to tropical regions of the Americas.

products.heading: Lush big leaf
products.description: Bracken is a genus of large, coarse ferns in the family Dennstaedtiaceae.

products.heading: Exclusive bonsai
products.description: Bonsai is a Japanese version of the original traditional Chinese art penjing or penzai.
